author: noble
msg: SOLR-7757: Improved security framework where security components can be edited/reloaded, Solr now watches /security.json. Components can choose to make their config editable, SOLR-7838: An authorizationPlugin interface where the access control rules are stored/managed in ZooKeeper , SOLR-7837: An AuthenticationPlugin which implements the HTTP BasicAuth protocol and stores credentials securely in ZooKeeper
